millsfield:images_texts:
INFLIGHT TEAMMATE
BIDDING WORKBOOK
YOUR LIFE. YOUR BID.
YOUR SUCCESS.
america

BE VIRGIN.
EXCEPT WHEN BIDDING.
Dear Virgin America Teammates:
Welcome aboard! We are so glad to have you join us.
We recognize the many new challenges you are facing as you settle in and find your "rhythm"; one of
the most important elements in finding that "rhythm" is bidding. We want you to succeed and thrive
at Virgin America and getting a schedule that your seniority can hold, while supporting your personal
life needs, comes from taking personal ownership of your bid and the use of proper bidding
techniques.
Your Scheduling Advisory Team, in partnership with Crew Planning, CSS and Corporate Learning, are
excited to introduce the Inflight Teammate Bidding Workbook. This resource has been designed for
you as a tool to plan life events, schedule preferences and to ensure you receive the most successful
bid award possible.
The members of the Scheduling Advisory Team are here as a resource to help you maximize your
schedule and assist you in achieving your goals.
Please feel free to email us at any time; we are also available in the Villages during the monthly bid
period for support. Careful planning and a systematic approach to the bidding process can optimize
your schedule and make your personal and professional life here at Virgin America the best it can be.
We look forward to working with each and every one of you.
Sincerely,
Scheduling Advisory Team
schedulingadvisoryteam@virginamerica.com
